personalInfo.name: Kundan Ray
personalInfo.title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer | Entrepreneur | Product Builder
personalInfo.location: Kathmandu, Nepal (until Aug 2025) → Melbourne, VIC (from Sep 2025)

platforms.name: LinkedIn
platforms.role: Thought leadership, hiring signal, product logs

personalTraits.description: Leads with humility; focuses on learning and outcomes over credit.
People who don’t need anything from me tend to enjoy my vibe; I keep spaces calm and constructive.
When caught between conflicts, I don’t judge. I listen to both sides. If I have experience, I share; if not, I reason logically.
I love children deeply. My nephew calls me father on Father’s Day — I see time as milestones in shaping how kids grow.
Gravitates to physics/maths reasoning; explains complex systems simply.

lifeEvents.title: Childhood in Pataili, Mahottari
lifeEvents.description: Simple village life with enough to feed on, public school till Grade 2.

lifeEvents.title: Moved to Kathmandu
lifeEvents.description: After Grade 3, shifted to Kathmandu; changed schools based on what was feasible for parents.
lifeEvents.impact: Learned to adapt quickly to new environments.

lifeEvents.title: Skipped Grades 5 and 7
lifeEvents.description: Parents accelerated my path when they felt I was taking it easy.
lifeEvents.impact: Built discipline and a growth mindset early.

lifeEvents.title: Love for Physics & Maths
lifeEvents.description: Found meaning in how maths and physics explain the world.

lifeEvents.title: Scholarship in Grades 9–10
lifeEvents.description: Merit-based scholarship; performed well academically.

lifeEvents.title: Science at CCRC (Balkumari)
lifeEvents.description: Did well in 11–12; happy and fulfilling student life.
lifeEvents.impact: Solid science foundation; teamwork and discipline.

lifeEvents.title: Mechanical Engineering in Bangalore (1 month)
lifeEvents.description: Tried ME but returned after a month—misfit + costs.
lifeEvents.impact: Clarity on alignment between passion and path.

lifeEvents.title: IOE Entrance (Nepal) → Computer Engineering
lifeEvents.description: Cleared IOE and joined Computer Engineering.
lifeEvents.impact: Defined software path with long-term upside.

lifeEvents.title: Teaching 11–12 CS at Xavier’s International & CCRC
lifeEvents.description: Explained beyond syllabus (e.g., CPU clocks) to make CS tangible; supported living while studying.

lifeEvents.title: Computer Engineering Graduation + Engineering License
lifeEvents.description: Completed in 4 years with no backlogs; obtained license.
lifeEvents.impact: Credibility to pair with practical skills.

lifeEvents.title: Nine-Year Relationship
lifeEvents.description: Dated my now-wife for 9 years—grew together through teens and 20s.

lifeEvents.title: Marriage
lifeEvents.description: Married; 3 years in, still an adventure together.

lifeEvents.title: React Native Dev @ SemiColon Tec
lifeEvents.description: Ride-sharing UI; improved retention.

lifeEvents.title: React Native Dev @ Core Dreams
lifeEvents.description: Cab reservation UX; engagement and booking time gains.

lifeEvents.title: Software Engineer @ Treeleaf.AI
lifeEvents.description: NFC POS integration; UX redesign.

lifeEvents.title: Software Engineer @ Outcode
lifeEvents.description: React/React Native delivery; Three.js AutoCAD-like system that helped win major business.

lifeEvents.title: Srvd – Legal Ops Platform
lifeEvents.description: Role-based workflows, mobile updates, reporting.

lifeEvents.title: MetricWire – Wearable Data Portal
lifeEvents.description: Garmin → TimescaleDB pipeline; real-time research dashboards.

lifeEvents.title: MarchUp – ADHD Student App
lifeEvents.description: Focus features + GRE flashcards; simple game-like UX.

lifeEvents.title: Recon – Infra Risk Mapping
lifeEvents.description: TypeScript + ESRI ArcGIS; bridge risk assessments.

lifeEvents.title: Provocative – Lean Cloud Platform
lifeEvents.description: CloudStack-based AWS-like platform; RBAC, multi-tenant.

lifeEvents.title: Senior Software Engineer (Consultant) @ Gurzu
lifeEvents.description: Quality oversight, GenAI adoption, UX uplift, onboarding docs.

lifeEvents.title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer @ Binyan Studios
lifeEvents.description: AI toolkit, centralized queues, 3D CMS (Three.js), on-device vector search, Zero-Trust, docs & onboarding.

lifeEvents.title: Volunteering: Blood for Nepal & Bagmati Cleanup
lifeEvents.description: Organised blood donations; river cleanups.

lifeEvents.title: Music as Peace
lifeEvents.description: Enjoy singing casually, often with my wife joining in. Music feels like a peaceful escape and a dream to formally learn basics someday.
lifeEvents.impact: Balances intense engineering life with soulful calm.

lifeEvents.title: Dream to Fly a Plane
lifeEvents.description: Strong interest in aviation and flight. Joke about knowing how shuttles land, but real aspiration is to pilot someday.
lifeEvents.impact: Represents curiosity and pursuit of freedom.

lifeEvents.title: Bond with Nephew
lifeEvents.description: My nephew greets me as father on Father’s Day. I see him like my son and value being part of his growth journey.
lifeEvents.impact: Strengthens view of time as milestones in shaping kids’ lives.

projects.name: Provocative
projects.description: Lean AWS-like cloud platform (CloudStack, RBAC, multi-tenant).

projects.name: MarchUp
projects.description: ADHD student support app with GRE flashcards and focus features.

projects.name: Recon
projects.description: Bridge/infrastructure risk mapping with ESRI hex layers.

projects.name: 3D CMS
projects.description: Database-driven scenes/styles/assets rendered in real time.

achievements: Graduated Computer Engineering with no backlogs; obtained engineering license
Shipped 10+ production systems across lawtech, health, cloud and mapping
Won/secured business via innovative Three.js AutoCAD-like POC
Cut new-hire onboarding time by ~25% through living docs and API guides
Invited hackathon judge; mentoring and community advocacy
Volunteering: Blood for Nepal, Bagmati River cleanup
interests: Music — peaceful escape, sometimes singing with my wife
Aviation — fascination with flying, dream to pilot a plane
Neutral advisor role — giving logical or experience-based takeaways
Kids & family growth — valuing time as milestones

linkedinActivity.style: Reflective, builder-centric, visual demos, occasional spicy takes with data
goals: Mentor juniors and share learning paths

timeline.summary: Pataili village → public school; move to Kathmandu
Bangalore ME attempt → return; IOE pass → Computer Eng
Mobile/web roles; Srvd, Recon, MetricWire, MarchUp
Provocative MVP; Gurzu consulting; Binyan senior role
Volunteering: Blood for Nepal, Bagmati cleanup

notes: Dates for some early events are approximate and narrative-accurate.
Safe to expose on portfolio; omit personal phone/email if publishing public JSON.
